hero.title: Quality through
hero.description5: with passion, experience and education. In my work I create simple and advanced mobile applications and websites. I help in project analysis, UI/UX creation, programming, testing, up to maintenance. I am happy to share my knowledge and learn from others.

about.title: About me
about.description1: I am an experienced developer who specializes in mobile applications, websites and providing other IT solutions. I have six years of commercial experience in the industry, and I always strive to understand my clients' needs and provide quality solutions that exceed their expectations.

values.title: My values
values.description: Values are fundamental to me in my work and in my interactions with clients. I believe they are essential to building business relationships.

specialties.title: Specialties
specialties.description: I am an experienced developer who specializes in mobile applications, websites and providing other IT solutions. I have five years of commercial experience in the industry, and I always strive to understand my clients' needs and provide quality solutions that exceed their expectations.

specialty1.title: Mobile development
specialty1.description: I specialize in creating apps that are not only visually appealing but also intuitive and easy to use. With an eye for detail and a passion for delivering quality work, I strive to create apps that are optimized for performance, security, and user satisfaction.
specialty1.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React Native, MobX, Redux, Tanstack Query, Apollo, REST, GraphQL, RN Testing Library, Detox, Native modules, Java, Objective-C, Vision Camera

specialty2.title: Web development
specialty2.description: As a programmer, I also specialize in developing web applications. I have experience on both the front-end and back-end side, which allows me to create complex solutions for my clients. Contact me today to discuss your requirements and have me develop your web application.
specialty2.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, Strapi, NestJS, Tailwind, React Testing Library, WDIO

specialty3.title: Know-how
specialty3.description: I have a broad spectrum of knowledge and skills in the IT field. I can offer many different solutions to help you achieve your business goals. In addition, I enjoy sharing my know-how with others, which allows me to develop my skills and gain new experiences. I will be happy to help you with your IT project and achieve success in the industry.
specialty3.technologies: Google Play, App Store, Microsoft Store, CI / CD, ML algorithms, BLE devices, Code audits, Image processing, OpenCV, Motion solutions, Architecture planning, Mentoring, Consulting

experience.title: My journey
experience.description: Without working on products used by users we cannot talk about gaining experience. My experience is based on working with real problems, communicating with other people and providing solutions that will meet users’ expectations. Education is also very important to me. Learning about theory and new ways to solve problems has real benefits in practice. Advanced solutions increase productivity, solution efficiency and are often the answer to customer needs.

experiencePosition1.description: As a freelance developer, I specialize in developing mobile applications and web-based web applications – both on the front-end and back-end. I have extensive knowledge and skills in the IT field, so I can offer a variety of solutions to help you achieve your business goals. I provide consultation and training.

experiencePosition9.description: In my senior role, I work on a mobile application for a client in the United States working in the Life Sciences and Pharmaceutical industries, perform technical recruiting, and share my knowledge with the team.

experiencePosition2.description: I teach students in the Computer Science department in the areas of programming fundamentals, object-oriented programming and programming paradigms. I am actively working on my research development in the department of Cyber Security and Computational Linguistics.
experiencePosition2.technologies: C / C++, Java, Javascript, Haskell, Prolog, Automata Theory

experiencePosition3.description: My work involved project development for greenhouse owners. My work included the creation of a mobile application, a website with a backend, a promotional page, documentation and communication with the client. In addition, I was involved in technical recruiting, mentoring and technical research.

experiencePosition4.position: Master studies in the field of Computer Science
experiencePosition4.description: I finished my studies by defending my master's thesis on the topic "The mechanism of argumentation mining in legal cases texts using recurrent neural networks." written in the department of intelligent systems.

experiencePosition5.description: Creating applications using React Native and ReactJS, conducting technical recruiting interviews.

experiencePosition6.description: Mobile application development in React Native and Ionic, integration with native components, external device integration, research projects.

experiencePosition7.position: Bachelor studies in the field of Computer Science
experiencePosition7.description: I finished my studies by defending my bachelor's thesis on the topic "Segmentation of legal texts using machine learning algorithms" written in the department of intelligent systems.

experiencePosition8.position: Windows Phone / Universal Windows Platform freelancer
experiencePosition8.description: Design, publish and maintain own mobile and desktop applications for Windows Phone and Windows 10.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: The knowledge I gain is also to be confirmed in the form of certificates of completion of courses.

certificate1.title: Mathematics for Machine Learning
certificate1.description: The course included the following parts: Linear Algebra, Multivariate Calculus and Principal Component Analysis (PCA).

certificate2.title: Deep Learning Specialization
certificate2.description: The course included the following parts: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization; Sequence Models; Neural Networks and Deep Learning; Structuring Machine Learning Projects; Convolutional Neural Networks.

certificate3.title: Machine Learning Specialization
certificate3.description: The course included the following parts: Supervised MachineLearning: Regression and Classification, Advanced Learning Algorithms, Unsupervised Learning, Recommenders, Reinforcement Learning.

certificate4.title: NLP Specialization
certificate4.description: The course included the following parts: Natural Language Processing with Classification and Vector Spaces, Probabilistic Models, Sequence Models and Attention Models.

speeches.title: Speeches
speeches.description: I try to share my knowledge and publish my results.

speech1.title: Machine Learning in JavaScript
speech1.description: A lecture on the use of machine learning algorithms in Javascript with examples.

speech2.title: Mechanism for detecting cause-and-effect relationships in court judgments
speech2.publisher: 18th Conference on Computer Science and Intelligence Systems
speech2.description: Proceedings of the Proceedings of the 18th Conference on Computer Science and Intelligence Systems, M. Ganzha, L. Maciaszek, M. Paprzycki, D. Ślęzak (eds). ACSIS, Vol. 35, pages 1041–1046 (2023)

education.title: Certificates
education.description: The knowledge I gain is also to be confirmed in the form of certificates of completion of courses.

otherActivities.title: Other activities
otherActivities.description: The knowledge I gain is also to be confirmed in the form of certificates of completion of courses.

more.title: Want more?
more.description: I care about knowledge sharing, so I am happy to share what I know. See more topics on my blog.

constcash.title: ConstCash
constcash.description1: ConstCash is a personal finance management application. It allows you to have an advanced overview of reports and statistics, create budgets or add your own financial goals.
constcash.description2: Learn more about the application by reading

contact.title: Do you want me to work for you?
contact.description: Im a mobile and web developer with various interests, I can help you with creating mobile applications or websites. I can create layout, develop app and share it to people.
